projects.title: Climate Change and Valley Fever
projects.description: Conducted statistical data research experiment to explore how different environmental aspects of climate change affected the number of valley fever cases in the southwestern US.

image.alt: Valley fever map of Southwest United States

projects.title: Predicting Taxi Ride Duration
projects.description: This project was for my class at UC Berkeley called Data 100 (Principles and Techniques of Data Science). I created a regression model that predicts the travel time of a taxi ride in New York.

projects.title: Presidential Twitter Behavior
projects.description: This project was for my class at UC Berkeley called Data 100 (Principles and Techniques of Data Science). I worked with Twitter data to analyze Donald Trump's tweets using sentiment analysis.

projects.title: Reported Laser Pointings at Aircrafts
projects.description: Utilized Tableau and Excel to clean and manipulate data set to explore trends of illegal aircraft laser pointings.
